website_summaries.verdict: Enjoy breezing through moves with responsive, shock-absorbing Max Air cushioning.
pros: Breathable design featuring ultra-soft and flexible mesh
Raised nubs on the outsole for effortless multi-directional traction, ideal for sharp turns
cons: Toe box might feel a bit too rounded off or wide for some people

customer_reviews.title: Traded out my high heels
customer_reviews.text: I am a high heels girl. But during a pandemic these are the shoes for you. I walk EVERYWHERE in them and have not worn my high heels for two months now. Never thought I would be a sneakers gal, but these may have converted me... temporarily of course. These fit true to size, are super comfortable (I walk hills) and did not give me shin splints. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Leitz

customer_reviews.title: Shoes had been worn- disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Overpriced item- shoes were USED, as seen in the pictures. Very disappointed and will not buy from this seller again. Item was placed in repurposed box and even had crusty item stuck on sole, as seen in picture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than regular size
customer_reviews.text: Was way small, it was really hard to get it on to my feet. Very narrow, when I was able to get them on I felt like my circulation was cut off for a while. But I left them on and walked around in them it seem to help them stretch, the more use they get they are almost broken into fitting comfortably without being tight after wearing them 3 days. But they don't seem original. But at first glance they are noticeably smaller than a normal size 12. Recomend trying a size up.
customer_reviews.author: Dari Ellery Coleman

customer_reviews.title: wife loves em
customer_reviews.text: she said tey were a little snug but sole is very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Shroyer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, accurate sizing
customer_reviews.text: This product is great, it has a snug comfortable fit and I love the colors. Sizing is accurate. Would definitely recommend this shoe. The only improvement I'd make is a different sole, I do alot of walking and I'll see how the sole hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Star Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable !
customer_reviews.text: These I didn't like, they are s little big and most of all they're NOT comfortable imp, so for that reason I'm returning them . .
customer_reviews.author: Tonyak.williams

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Shoes fit as expected. Comfortable and plush. The hot pink is the ideal shade and the black and white touch creates balance.
customer_reviews.author: MyMy143

customer_reviews.title: Thanks like them just wish y'all had them in all black
customer_reviews.text: Wish u had them in all black but I like them thanks

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves them and say they’re comfortable and fit perfect
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Young

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good product, comfortable and beautifully designed. Shipping was fast. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: ROBERTO HERNANDEZ

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe
customer_reviews.text: Tried on a 8 in the store and it was too snug, they didn't have a 8.5. Amazon did and it was cheaper! Shoe fits as expected. I'm usually a 8 but the 8.5 fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Carly

customer_reviews.title: Love  Nike!
customer_reviews.text: Love my new Nike shoes, very comfortable and great quality! I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoes! I would definitely order another pair in another color as well. Shipment came sooner than the expected date which made me happy.
customer_reviews.author: Denise C

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit. And the shoe looks better in person than on the screen. Absolutely buy!!!

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! They look great on me and they are comfortable. My plus is the fact that they match my black and gold studio3 Beats lol.
customer_reviews.author: Honey Silk Jay

customer_reviews.title: Would buy these again!
customer_reviews.text: I love my Shoes. So comfortable an cool. Would highly recommend them to anyone.

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about these Nike gumshoe They fit just right .I had enough room in them.I love the beautiful color.

customer_reviews.title: The shoe runs small
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the shoe in wide. However, it was extremely tight and difficult to put on. I am going to have to return the shoes.

customer_reviews.title: Premature wear in flexible fabric
customer_reviews.text: Watch for weave fatigue where the foot flexes. It is frayed on both sides and shoes.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I have bought two pairs because I love them so much. Perfect fit and amazing to squat in!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Nike Women's Air Max Bella Trainer 2 Sneaker
product_meta.description: Crafted with an ultra-soft mesh upper and the comfort of max air, NIKE air bella TR women's training shoe carries you through your workout in style. Great for cardio, exercise classes and short runs, this trainer delivers midfoot lockdown and multi-directional traction in a chic silhouette
feature_bullets: Shaft measures approximately low-top from arch
Max Air unit provides responsive cushioning
Raised nubs on the outsole for multidirectional traction.
Synthetic leather cage around midfoot for secure lockdown
Partial bootie construction provides a sock-like fit
